ovdesc.p: This table is used to generated XML reports based on AM.REP.TEMPLATE records online.

desc.p: Must be valid SEC.ACC.MASTER record id(s).
Statement date for reporting (last date reported upon).
Reporting template to be used by this reporting process.
Must be a valid template in AM.REP.TEMPLATE.
Start date for reporting. Defaults to 30 calendar days before the statement date (PR.STMT.DATED).
Must be a valid date less than or equal to the statement date.
Sub report(s) to be used for reporting.
Defaulted from the reporting template (PR.REP.TEMPLATE) if specified. If a reporting template has been specified, the PR.SUB.REPORT(s) must exist on the reporting template.
Account officer - this field can be used to automatically populate the list of portfolios to be reported upon.
Record key for AM.REP.ONLINE - alphanumeric, up to 10 characters.
The number of calendar days after statement date to offset the end date of the portfolio statement.
